page.title: 04GROSMONT 4 FACILITIES
page.content:
Grosmont has facilities like The Angel Inn which has a pub and is opposite The Town Hall.The Gents Toilets are on the right of the Inn and the Laidies are round the corner.There is a Caravan Site quite near.There are a few Bed and Breakfast places such as one near the castle road.There is accommodation of other sorts in Grosmont.Also there is a Post Office in which you can get stamps,food, post cards,cakes or sweets. {The following poem describes the {natural beauty of the village.
{GROSMONT As you walk through the pleasant country Admiring all the beauties around, Can't you see all the things around, I wouldn't like to live in a town.
